  (bracket_start)
  (parameter)
  (bracket_end))

(blade
  (directive)

  (bracket_end))

================================================================================
@inlineSection
================================================================================

@section('test','test')

@section('test')
  <div></div>
@endsection

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(blade
  (inlineSection
    (directive)
    (bracket_start)
    (parameter
      (text))
    (parameter
      (text))
    (bracket_end))
  (section
    (directive_start)
    (bracket_start)
    (parameter
      (text))
    (bracket_end)
    (text)
    (directive_end)))

  (bracket_end))

@use('App\Models\Flight', 'FlightModel')

  (bracket_end))

================================================================================

  (bracket_end)
